comments.body: Why is the jitter the same as max?

Jitter should be double with the default value of 0.2. It is a factor mentioned in [ExponentialBackOff](https://github.com/apache/kafka/blob/trunk/clients/src/main/java/org/apache/kafka/common/utils/ExponentialBackoff.java#L30).
What about the copying threads? Is that separate from this?

Hmm, why these properties need to be defined under a separate class?
A number of other existing properties are just defined inline in `KafkaConfig`, and so could these. Example: https://github.com/apache/kafka/blob/ff3b2d67a1049c75b300547ca6ecf074b6a3ab28/core/src/main/scala/kafka/server/KafkaConfig.scala#L917-L935
`KafkaConfig` become huge and it is inconvenient to go through the class too. Having a separate class with respective configs gives a better structure of the code and also readability.
